title: How Many Calories in 10 McNuggets?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 10 McNuggets, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Chicken McNuggets (breaded, fried chicken pieces, ~16.5 g each); no dipping sauce or sides included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, portion size, frying method, and customizations. Check McDonald's app or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 10 Chicken McNuggets provide ~460 kcal and ~24 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 packet of BBQ dipping sauce
Add 1 packet of sweet 'n sour sauce

faqs.q: How many calories in one McNugget?
faqs.a: About 46 kcal per standard Chicken McNugget.

faqs.q: What is the protein in 10 McNuggets?
faqs.a: Roughly 24 g of protein from 10 Chicken McNuggets.
Yes, 10 McNuggets have ~800 mg sodiumâ€”watch if on a low-sodium diet.
Typically 0 g trans fat in modern recipes, but check for updates.

faqs.q: How do sauces affect calories in 10 McNuggets?
faqs.a: One sauce packet adds 45-70 kcal; choose low-cal options like honey mustard to minimize.
